data.text: We take football season pretty seriously - especially when our favorite teams (the @Raiders and @Colts) play each other - so we suited up for a battle between the bases. @superridiculous Please be assured that our top priority is to get each and every one of our passengers to their destination on time, but we will never sacrifice safety to meet an on-time departure or arrival. If you need assistance, please send us a PM with your details and request. - GM

@superridiculous Hi Matt! We are so sorry for the inconvenience you experienced due to this cancellation. We absolutely recognize how important it is to get you to your destination on time. Unfortunately, daily operational challenges sometimes interfere with our schedules, with little notice.

@TangelaRichh We are sorry your flight is delayed! If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your details and request. Please not all DM's are answered in the order received. There may be a bit of a wait. We appreciate your patience. - GM

urls.title: Lost and Found
urls.description: Please note that NYC Transit now offers shipping of recovered lost items. When the item is found, having your item(s) shipped saves you a trip to the Lost and Found Office, at the 34th Street-Penn Station lower mezzanine of the A, C and E subway train lines. We encourage you to take advantage of this shipping convenience. It’s fast, easy, and safe. Please, always wait for an email and/or text message from us if you want to pick up a found item before dropping

data.text: @sahisridhar Oh no! We are so sorry to hear that. Please file a lost and found claim here: https://t.co/MdCDdAtdUt. -GM
@CNoln Hi Conner! We are sorry to learn you are having a hard time reaching us. Please send us a DM with your details and request. We would be happy to review. - GM

@Sissy5coat Hi Sister Christian! Safety is our primary focus in all of our operations at Allegiant, and it is never our intention to cause discomfort in flight for any of our passengers, so we do sincerely apologize for the uncomfortable experience you had on your recent flight. - GM
@kayla_keaton3 Hi Kayla! We're sorry for the hold time. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your details and request. - GM
@bobbidempsey Hi Bobbi, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We can see that you have already been assisted via DM. Please feel free to reach back out if you need any additional assistance. -N
@shawn_adams1 Hi Shawn! What is your flight number? We would be happy to look into this for you. - GM
@igotthejuice95 Hi there! We're sorry you're having a hard time reaching us. Please send us a DM with your details and concern. - GM

@TVatWork Hello Thomas. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we currently have an influx of calls & messages. Please send us a DM if you still need assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - HW

@IlnickiStudios Our Customer Care line is absolutely up and running. We have customer care reps answering calls 24/7. We are receiving an influx of calls/messages/emails due to flight disruptions caused by weather and operational needs. If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM

data.text: @BlueInFlorida76 Card Member Services is an exclusive phone line for Allegiant World Mastercard® holders.
